context: Hello. WHat kinds of movies do you like?
How are you? How are you? i like comedy movies like American Pie (1999) and Scary Movie (2000)
The old ones are better I'm pretty good thank you
Okay, I've seen those. Have you seen The Goonies (1985) ? Thats an old good one!
No, i haven't, is it interesting?
Also. I always enjoy Jaws (1975) , if you want a classic.
I think i will try those ones Thank you for your time and your help
resp: For an interesting action movie maybe Michael Clayton (2007) ?
